original_text: And it came to pass after these things, that his master's wife cast her eyes upon Joseph; and she said, Lie with me.
korean_text: 그 후에 그의 주인의 아내가 요셉에게 눈짓하다가 동침하기를 청하니

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after these things,
that his master's wife cast her eyes upon Joseph;
sentences.korean_translation: 그 주인의 아내가 요셉에게 눈을 두었고
